com.nexttech.spanishreview.worksheet

Class WorksheetGrader

    • Method Detail

      • getCorrectKingWorksheet

        public static java.lang.String[][] getCorrectKingWorksheet()
                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        If correctWorksheet is null, converts a stringWorksheet from WorksheetGenerator to id number format, using the BiMap in Utils. It sets this converted worksheet to correctWorksheet, so that this only has to be done once.
        Returns:
        correctWorksheet
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getScore

        public static int getScore(java.lang.String[][] origWorksheet,
           java.lang.String[][] toBeGraded)
        Calculates the score for a worksheet given the original (unfilled) worksheet and the worksheet that is to be graded.
        Parameters:
        origWorksheet - A String[][] that contains the headers and values that were given to the student to fill the worksheet from
        toBeGraded - A String[][] that contains everything from origWorksheet and the additional values that the student has filled out.
        Returns:
        An integer representation of the score, from 0 to 40. Any signs of cheating give a score of 0.

      • isBlankSheet

        public static boolean isBlankSheet(java.lang.String[][] worksheet)
        Checks if the given String[][] worksheet is blank - if the first element in each row is not blank
        Parameters:
        worksheet - A String[][] that represents the worksheet
        Returns:
        Boolean, true if worksheet is blank template

      • hasBlanksInSheet

        public static boolean hasBlanksInSheet(java.lang.String[][] worksheet)
        Checks if the worksheet is fully filled out. This check is also done client side, but it is done here to bypass possible client side tampering with the JavaScript.
        Parameters:
        worksheet - A String[][] that represents the worksheet to check
        Returns:
        true if the worksheet has blanks, false otherwise

      • getThresholdScore

        public static int getThresholdScore()
